attributes.additional_details: Palestine has verified reports of famine with adults and children suffering.
attributes.background: Debate with the Israeli government, to allow humanitarian aid to be deployed in Palestine.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions which call for a similar action:

Use diplomacy, increase support for Urgent Food Aid to Vulnerable People in Gaza 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734069

Urgent air drops of humanitarian aid into Gaza 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734018
